title: HelloWorld-RBlog from SMU Library Lvl 5
text: Welcome to R Series Workshop, last series.

title: About
text: In this webpage, I keep all my documents which Iâ€™ve learned so far from R Series 1 to 9.

title: R Series 6: Financial Data Analysis with R
text:
pacman::p_load(tidyquant, timetk, tidyverse, knitr)


company <- read_csv("data/SGCompany.csv")


Stock_daily <- company %>%
  select(Symbol) %>%
  tq_get(get = "stock.prices", 
         from = "2020-01-01", 
         to = "2023-12-31") 


Stock_data <- Stock_daily %>%
  left_join(company)


Stock_data %>%
  filter(Name == "DBS Group") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = close)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(title = "DBS Group Holdings Ltd (DBSDF) Daily Stock Price", 
         y = "Closing Price", x = "") + 
    theme_tq()









Stock_data %>%
  group_by(Name) %>%
  plot_time_series(date, close,
                   .facet_ncol   = 2,
                   .facet_scales = "free",
                   .interactive  = FALSE)









end <- as_date("2023-12-31")
start <- end - weeks(4)
Stock_data %>%
  filter(Name == "DBS Group") %>%
  filter(date >= start - days(2 * 15)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=date, y=close)) +
  geom_candlestick(aes(open=open,
                       high=high,
                       low=low,
                       close=close)) +
  labs(title =  "Daily stock prices of DBS Group") +
  coord_x_date(xlim = c(start, end)) + 
  theme_tq()
